page_content: The page offers a digital learning platform for employees of the Canton of Solothurn, covering various topics including IT courses.
The page provides various PDF forms and guides related to tax declarations for the year 2020.
The page discusses work programs for inmates, including various crafts and trades but does not focus on software or provide guides about it.
The page provides a handbook for tax register managers, mentioning the introduction of new tax software NEST.
The page provides information on groundwater management maps for construction and planning in the Canton of Solothurn.
The page provides information on mandatory accident insurance for employees of the Canton of Solothurn.
The page discusses a traffic model for the Canton of Solothurn, calculated using the software VISUM/VISEVA.
